title: Nexio - 🚀丨start⋅here
html:
**Welcome to the Nexio Community!**

Introducing Nexio, the ultimate Bitcoin DeFi solution. We're creating a high-throughput, low-cost DeFi environment using the most secure smart contract language on the most secure blockchain.

**Parallelization + Bitcoin + Degens = THE GREATEST COMMUNITY THERE IS!!**

title: Nexio - 🚀丨start⋅here
html:
More roles and achievement tasks will be added over time, but right now these are the current roles:

@🌟 The Laser-Eyed Fridge is for people who joined in the first 3 days.

@🔥Jumbo Fridge  is the role for the rest of the first week, from day 4 to day 7.

@🎮 Game Master Fridge, @🏆 A slightly Used Fridge, and @🏆 Movers fridge can be earned by playing the https://discord.com/channels/1260488248266854431/1264789634378891315. Make sure to read the rules here: https://discord.com/channels/1260488248266854431/1264792031096733717.

@🚀  Rocket Powered Fridge  is for those who entered after week 1.

@🤖  Robot Fridge is for people who joined after the @🚀 Rocket Powered Fridge.

@⚔️Rumble Beginner-Fridge is for those that win https://discord.com/channels/1260488248266854431/1264858194732257320.

@The Nexican Fridge is given to people once they reach level 10.

@The NexKage Fridge is given to people once they reach level 20.

@😂 Upbo the meme-ing Fridge is for people who create art and memes that become stickers and emojis in our Discord. This is also given to people who make and post exceptionally great memes.

@🦍 WASSA GORILLA FRIDGE  is for people who have the gorilla role on the Gorilla Moverz discord 

@Mini-Fridge is a role that takes some time to get.

@🔥 Booster Fridge is for people who boost the server.

@OG Royal Mini-Fridge will be given to all of us within the year once we are the best Bitcoin Rollup.

@🍟 The French Fry Fridge is for people who create extraordinary Twitter content. The first person who received this made a song that we absolutely loved. Check it out here: https://x.com/lrw6248/status/1812471541881618547.

There are a few people who have 1/1 roles; these are given on a situational basis.
